price: ߝߏ߫ ߒ߬ ߠߊ߫ ߛߦߊ߬ ߝߟߐ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߲ ߕߍ߫ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ( ߡߎ߬ߕߎ߲߫ ߓߊ߬ )؟
arabic: إِلَّا مَوۡتَتَنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: illā mawtatanā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
